## Checklist
<!-- Put an 'x' in all boxes that apply -->
- [ ] My code follows the existing code style and patterns
- [ ] I have added my changes to the `$Global:enhancementOptions` section with proper structure
- [ ] All new options include: Name, Description, Category, RegistryPath, RegistryName, RegistryValue
- [ ] I have tested my changes thoroughly
- [ ] My changes do not break existing functionality
- [ ] I have updated documentation (README.md) if needed
- [ ] I have verified the option count in the GUI subtitle matches the total options
- [ ] My changes respect user privacy and system security

## Additional Notes
<!-- Any additional information that reviewers should know -->

## Contribution Philosophy
This project is about giving users control over their own computers, extending hardware lifespan, and reducing e-waste. Please ensure your contributions align with these principles:
- **User Control**: Users should have the choice, not Microsoft
- **Privacy First**: Reduce tracking and data collection where possible
- **Environmental Impact**: Help extend the usable life of older hardware
- **Transparency**: Clear explanations of what each option does
- **Safety**: Include appropriate warnings for potentially risky options
